channel.title: Food आहारः on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in Food आहारः on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Animal products
item.description: Bovine excreta Some rituals require you to intake gomutra and/or gomaya (cow dung). There is nothing strange about the consumption of bovine excreta and fecal matter. It is a common adaptation seen across pastoralists of different origins. We know our Indo-European strand of ancestry on the steppes did so; African cattle-breeding tribes do so; it will not be surprising if the Harappans & south Indian Ash mound tribes did something like that given that they were cattle rearers too.
